@aaltay Oh yes, this gets stalled as I've been focusing on the gearpump-runner. Both @tgroh and @kennknowles gave some good suggestions some while ago. The question is whether we want to cache `DoFnInvoker` in `DoFnLifecycleManager` since it's cheap to construct a `DoFnInvoker`.
Now this is an obsolete PR

@aaltay : I did test the change on RHEL7, Debian 9 and OS X. Let me know if you would like to have greater OS coverage.
@jasonkuster : Thanks for the review, I moved the version to the top level pom as requested.

One thing I was wondering of: there are numerous build related files (run_*.sh, generate_pydoc.sh and most recently findSupportedPython.groovy) are located now in Python-SDK's root. Shall we consider moving those files to a designated (build_utils) directory?
